cyclone.name: MICHAEL
cyclone.current_location: about 175 mi south of Cozumel, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Expected to move north across the Yucatan Channel, strengthen in the eastern Gulf of Mexico and then turn northeast toward the Florida Panhandle before moving across the southeastern United States

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tulum to Cabo Catoche, Yucatan Peninsula (Tropical Storm Watch)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Pinar del Rio and Isle of Youth, Cuba (Tropical Storm Warning)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Western Cuba, Yucatan Peninsula, Gulf Coast of Florida (mainly the Panhandle), then inland across GA/SC/NC
